title: Friend Not Showing Up in Gifting Center
body: Hello, so I'm trying to gift Xayah to a friend but no matter what their name won't appear in the gifting center. I friended this person very recently, does that have anything to do with it?

replies.body: Ahhhhh you may not have had them on your friend's list for 24 hours yet. One of the [**gifting stipulations**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) is that you have to have someone on your friend's list for at least 1 day before you can send them gifts.
I'm curious. Why is this the case? What if I wanted to gift a player in my game a skin for his efforts?  (This happened to me recently)
Ah, OK, thank you very much!
